name: Slammer Split
description:
How to play:

WASD to move, left click to attack, right click to throw baton, space to run.

Attack prisoners to knock them out then click on them to put them in prison again.

Throw your baton at prisoners to slow them down and catch them easier.

If you run out of stamina you slow down for 3 seconds.

Prisoners will stop running if you hide behind a tree,lake,bush, or prison.

You can screen-wrap if you make it to the edge of the map.

Once you catch 20 prisoners go to the prison to finish!

Credits:

Music made by: Kubbi 

Sounds made by: bradwesson and qubodup
